title: Google won two major awards at MWC Barcelona 2025.
description: Today Google has been honored with two Global Mobile (GLOMO) Awards at Mobile World Congress 2025. Celebrating 30 years of excellence, the GLOMOs, judged by over 200 ind…
excerpt: Today Google has been honored with two Global Mobile (GLOMO) Awards at Mobile World Congress 2025. Celebrating 30 years of excellence, the GLOMOs, judged by over 200 industry experts, recognize excellence in the mobile and digital industry.Pixel 9 Pro has been named “Smartphone of the Year,” following the Pixel 8 Series winning the award in 2024. And Gemini won the "Breakthrough Device Innovation" award, highlighting Google's leadership in AI-driven mobile experiences.
text: Today Google has been honored with two Global Mobile (GLOMO) Awards at Mobile World Congress 2025. Celebrating 30 years of excellence, the GLOMOs, judged by over 200 industry experts, recognize excellence in the mobile and digital industry.Pixel 9 Pro has been named “Smartphone of the Year,” following the Pixel 8 Series winning the award in 2024. And Gemini won the "Breakthrough Device Innovation" award, highlighting Google's leadership in AI-driven mobile experiences.
html:
Today Google has been honored with two Global Mobile (GLOMO) Awards at Mobile World Congress 2025. Celebrating 30 years of excellence, the GLOMOs, judged by over 200 industry experts, recognize excellence in the mobile and digital industry.

Pixel 9 Pro has been named “Smartphone of the Year,” following the Pixel 8 Series winning the award in 2024. And Gemini won the "Breakthrough Device Innovation" award, highlighting Google's leadership in AI-driven mobile experiences.
